contentrichtext.text: '''Choiseul''' may refer to: ==People== *[[Choiseul (surname)]]. Holders include:- ** [[Caesar, duc de Choiseul]] (1602-1675), French marshal and diplomat, generally known for the best part of his life as marshal du Plessis-Praslin ** [[Claude de Choiseul-Francières|Claude de Choiseul]] (1632-1711), marshal of France in 1693 ** [[César Gabriel de Choiseul]] (1712-1785), duc de Praslin, French officer, diplomat and statesman ** [[François Joseph de Choiseul, marquis de Stainville]] (1700-1770), French diplomat and statesman ** [[Étienne François, duc de Choiseul]] (1719-1785), French officer, diplomat and statesman ** [[Jacques Philippe de Choiseul, marquis de Choiseul-Stainville]] (1727-1789), French officer and statesman ** [[Claude Antoine Gabriel, duc de Choiseul-Stainville]] (1760-1838), French royalist ==Places== * [[Choiseul, Haute-Marne]], a ''commune'' in the Haute-Marne ''département'' in France * [[Choiseul Camp]], a [[Concentration camps in France|French concentration camp]] in the commune of Châteaubriant in Brittany, open from 1941 to 1942 * [[Choiseul Province]], a province of the Solomon Islands ** [[Choiseul Island]], the largest island of Choiseul Province, named after Étienne François de Choiseul ** [[Choiseul Bay]], a bay in Choiseul Island * [[Choiseul Quarter]], a quarter of Saint Lucia ** [[Choiseul, Saint Lucia]], the main city of Choiseul Quarter * [[Choiseul Sound]], a strait in the Falkland Islands ==Other uses== * [[Choiseul languages]], a group of Northwest Solomonic languages * [[Institut Choiseul for International Politics and Geoeconomics]], a French, non-partisan think tank {{Disambiguation|geo}}
